OOC: k, i'm playing Bonecrusher =)

--- Pacifix / Bonecrusher / Soundwave / Ikoto ---

Pacifix turns back to Ironhide. "Ironhide. It has been great training 
at the academy, and it has been an honour to command this 
mission. Regardless of what happens, we will try our hardest to 
keep the Decepticon forces in check." He extends his hand to the 
elder bot, his eyes glowing warmly as the realization that he will 
probably never see this place he had called home again punches 
him in the nose. "I'll miss you, and all of the other Autobots who I 
have left behind." He awaits Ironhide's response. He quickly opens 
a comm to JetV, "Ok, start the engines, I'll be onboard soon, and 
I'll tell you when to launch. Just get the engines fired up. And 
remember, when we launch, make sure that the stealth cloaking 
device has been turned on.

-----Meanwhile,

Bonecrusher joins the other Constructicons. "So this is the ship 
eh... not bad. Lets get going and destroy those puny Autobots." He 
stalks around impatiently, waiting for the rest of DED to appear.

Soundwave approaches the group, "Soundwave reporting." He 
waits impassively for the rest of the DED to show.

-----Several lightyears from Cybertron,

Azafroth and the other Ikoto shimmer, as they await the begining of 
the game. Azafroth rumbles to the others, "Ikoto, prepare to initiate 
the transwarp maelstorm. When the Autobots breach the one 
lightyear mark, then bring the maelstorm into existance. It will be 
difficult to sustain for too long, so do NOT fail in your timing." 
Azafroth takes his position, and waits for the ship to launch, 
unaware presently that another group, the DED, are also launching 
a ship to destroy the Autobot one.
